meanings.definition: Relating to a condition characterized by a lack of gamma globulins in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The agammaglobulinemic patient had a weakened immune system.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed him as agammaglobulinemic due to his low gamma globulin levels.
meanings.sent3: The agammaglobulinemic teddy bear couldn't fight off any germs.
meanings.sent4: Her agammaglobulinemic state left her vulnerable to infections like a castle without defenses.
meanings.sent5: The agammaglobulinemic condition made him as defenseless as a knight without armor.
